article.title: L-3 to Provide F-16 Mission Training Center
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: L-3 Communications Corporation, Link Simulation & Training, Arlington, Texas, is being awarded a $22,022,091 firm-fixed-price and firm-fixed-incentive, firm target contract for a fully immersive Block 40/50 F-16 Mission Training Center (MTC). Priced production options to buy up to 20 MTCs along with operations and contractor logistics support were also included. Aeronautical Systems Center, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
